# impulse

**Instance Property**

The total impulse in this collision pair obtained by adding up all the individual impulses applied at each contact point

## Declaration

```swift
let impulse: Float
```

## Characterizing the collision

- **position**: A position representing the estimated point of contact.

items.description: A position representing the estimated point of contact.
items.name: position
